content: then back - you can join with either mattress stitch or whip stitch here whichever is easiest - see fig 2 join dotted line a to b for front armhole seam and fig 3 join dotted line c to d for back armhole seam complete the details to complete add a couple of tiny buttons at the neck and join them together with a few loops of thread - see fig 4 b c d a x fig 2 fig 3 fig 4 remember to get in touch if you need a little extra advice and of course there is more much more to learn create and be inspired by here @dotpebbles_knits please also remember that this pattern like all of my patterns is copyrighted this prohibits copying or reproducing any of its writing content for your own profit however if you want to sell what you ve made from any of my patterns then that is perfectly fine - and please do share what you ve created from this pattern #dotpebbles_knits #dotpebblescreatureland #dotpebbles
